amendment.description: To amend the provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide for workforce flexibilities and certain Federal personnel provisions relating to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2214 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2214 proposed by Senator Ensign for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S15863) To amend the provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide for workforce flexibilities and certain Federal personnel provisions relating to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2214 proposed by Senator Ensign for Senator Voinovich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2214 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
